In England, in the seven days to 17 April, there were 153,880 new confirmed cases (272.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 April, there were 229,616 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 33% (75,736 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 April is 18,453,469 (32,632 cases per 100,000 population).
